file_content.text: You survived the gauntlet, Republic vermin, but now you can see....
There is no escaping the Mountain.
Alone, we are deadly. Together, we are death incarnate.
You're not what I expected.
Five brothers. Morgukai Jedi-hunters. Kings of the underworld. Your doom.
Why didn't someone tell me the Mountain is five ugly freaks?
There's more than one of you?
Shadows and mist surround the Mountain. They part only for those about to die.
I don't care how many "Mountains" I have to destroy, you're done.
Prepare to fall.
The Mountain fights as one. You will die here, and for what?
You throw your life away for nothing. The Republic-loving Hutt has used you.
Bareesh was leader of the Kintan Kings until the Mountain drove him out.
You and that ignorant ambassador are his pathetic instruments of revenge--and you have failed.
Regardless of Bareesh's motives, you'll pay for everything you've done.
Not revenge--justice.
Bareesh will answer for his lies, and you will answer for your crimes.
Wrong on both counts.
Your Force is powerless against us, Jedi.
I'll deal with Bareesh later. You chatterboxes are still first in line.
I've heard enough.
When you're dead, Bareesh has some explaining to do.
I knew that Hutt was no good.
Your death will be slow and painful.
Not yet, I haven't.
The Mountain was victorious the moment you stepped in here.
Shut up and die.
When this is over, the Mountain will string your entrails across the whole sector.
Brothers! We fight as one!
